memberdef.argsstring: (cache_entry_t *pentry_inode, cache_content_spec_data_t *pspecdata, cache_content_client_t *pclient, cache_content_add_behaviour_t how, fsal_op_context_t *pcontext, cache_content_status_t *pstatus)
memberdef.name: cache_content_new_entry

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_new_entry: adds an entry to the file content cache.
Adds an entry to the file content cache. This routine should be called only from the cache_inode layer.
No lock management is done in this layer: the related pentry in the cache inode layer is locked and will prevent from concurent accesses.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry in cache_inode layer for this file.
[IN] pointer to the entry's specific data
[IN] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management. [OUT] returned status.

briefdescription.para: Management of the file content cache: adding a new entry.

detaileddescription.para:
